short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search word meanings using My Dictionary Search. This Extension updates browser settings to upgrade default search provider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Dictionary Search provides access to Dictionary and Web Searches in your browser.
Easily get access to millions of web and dictionary search results with this extension.
"This extension updates your browser default search settings in the following ways:
- Allows for custom Dictionary searches directly from your browser omnibox
- Sets Yahoo as the default search setting in your browser"

Quick Tips for custom Dictionary search:
* Go to the address bar and type 'dictionary'. 
* After dictionary hit 'spacebar' or 'tab' on your keyboard.
* Type in the name of Dictionary you are trying to search."

List of Features: 
    - Manage your Search Settings: You can easily switch between Bing, Google and Yahoo search engines by updating settings via the link in the browser action modal.
    - Perform Dictionary searches in your omnibox and browser action modal
    - Perform Web Searches in your omnibox and browser action modal"
